articles.description: Explaining its rationale for a higher target, Motilal Oswal highlighted the cement firm's leadership position, robust expansion plans without leveraging the balance sheet, and structural cost improvement measures.

articles.content: IT company Coforge released its October-December quarter results on Monday and recorded a 31% quarter-on-quarter jump in its net profit at 238 crore from 181 crore posted during the quarter ending Se… [+2575 chars]

articles.title: India’s sudden market holiday risks denting global image - The Economic Times
articles.description: India's suspension of equities and currency trading reminded global investors of its frontier economy status, despite its growing equity market value and aspirations to be a market-friendly nation. The closure of the stock market for the inauguration of a Hin…
articles.content: Indias abrupt move to suspend equities and currency trading gave global investors a reminder of how the Wall Street-favored market can still act more like a frontier economy. To celebrate the opening… [+1867 chars]
